product.title: A Mini Museum on Your Desk – Collect Your Own Species Atlas
product.description: The Transparent Specimen Series features various species sourced from discarded bycatch, invasive species, or aquaculture deaths. Kairu aims to give new value to these lost lives through art.

contact.emailError: Please enter the correct Email format

intro.title: What is a transparent biological specimen?
intro.description: Transparent biological specimens are a unique way of preserving animals. Originally used in research, the process involves clearing and staining tissues while preserving the animal's shape using enzymes, dyes, and glycerin. Each specimen is one-of-a-kind—just like you.

valid.shippingPhone: Please enter the recipient's phone number

about.text: The members of the Hailiu Ecological Art Studio all have a background in marine biology and experience working in museums. They hope to focus on science, education, and art, and to get closer to people's lives through colorful transparent biological specimens and original marine biological cultural and creative products. Together, we will get to know and respect these good friends who live in the waters around Taiwan, and together we will make the ocean no longer unfamiliar so that everyone will no longer be unfamiliar with the ocean.

terms.title: Current Studio Membership Terms and Privacy Policy
terms.intro: Please carefully read the following terms. By registering as a member and agreeing to the policy, you acknowledge and accept all its contents.

section1.title: 1. Collection and Use of Member Information
section1.content: To provide personalized services and promotions, we may collect your name, email, phone number, address, and purchase history.

section2.title: 2. Data Protection Policy
section2.content: We implement reasonable technical and administrative measures to protect your data and provide rights to access, correct, or delete it.

section3.title: 3. Member Rights and Responsibilities
section3.content: Members are entitled to exclusive offers and services. Please keep your account secure. Misuse may result in membership suspension.

section4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section4.content: We may use cookies to analyze behavior and enhance your experience. You can manage cookies in your browser settings.

section5.title: 5. Terms Revisions and Notifications
section5.content: Current Studio reserves the right to revise these terms. Updates will be posted on our website without individual notifications.

section6.title: 6. Contact Information
section6.content: For questions, please contact us at service@currentstudio.com or call 0800-000-123.
